definition: Hong Kong Island/abbr. for 香港島|香港岛[Xiang1 gang3 dao3]
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang

sentences.english: If you go to Aberdeen on Hong Kong Island, you will see Ocean Park.
sentences.chinese: 如果你到港岛香港仔，你会看到海洋公园。

sentences.english: In case of dispute, Harbour Grand Hong Kong reserves the right on the final decision.
sentences.chinese: 如有任何争议，港岛海逸君绰酒店保留最终之决定权。

sentences.english: Local bus services on Hong Kong Island are provided by NWFB and CTB.
sentences.chinese: 港岛区的巴士服务现由新巴和城巴提供。

sentences.english: You can fish in the harbors of Kowloon, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kwun Tong or the Hong Kong Island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在港口鱼九龙尖沙咀或观塘香港岛。

sentences.english: Put the South Island Line under ground.
Tathong Channel, seen at dawn beyond a Hong Kong Island headland.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时份，香港岛一个岬角对开的蓝塘海峡美景。

sentences.english: Interchange station for the Island Line or Tsuen Wan Line.
sentences.chinese: 香港，乘客可以换乘港岛线或荃湾线。

sentences.english: The green and white star ferry to the island to swim slowly.
sentences.chinese: 绿白两色的天星小轮缓缓向港岛游去。

sentences.english: It takes only 45 minutes from Shenzhen city area to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 深圳市区距香港港岛仅45分钟车程。

sentences.english: On the Hong Kong Island, the population decreased in all districts.
sentences.chinese: 港岛方面，各区的人口均有所减少。

sentences.english: How many street lamps are there on Hong Kong and Lamma islands?
sentences.chinese: 目前港灯于香港岛及南丫岛上合共有超过多少支街灯？

sentences.english: You stay at a very new hotel in the heart of Hong Kong island.
sentences.chinese: 你将下塌在位于香港岛中心的一座新宾馆内。

sentences.english: Jackie attended the opening ceremony for the Island Golf Club on Hong Kong Island today.
sentences.chinese: 成龙大哥今天出席了香港岛高尔夫俱乐部的开幕仪式。

sentences.english: Chai Wan, This is the end of the Island Line, thank you for travelling on the MTR.
sentences.chinese: 柴湾，这是港岛线的终点站，谢谢乘搭地铁。

sentences.english: Mr Cheng leads the DAB ticket in the Hong Kong Island constituency for next month's poll.
sentences.chinese: 程介南位列民建联港岛区竞选名单之首。

sentences.english: Please exit for the Island Line towards Chai Wan.
sentences.chinese: 前往港岛线柴湾方向沿途各站，请在该站转车。

definition: Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
Tsim Sha Tsui, urbanized area in Hong Kong
Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong
Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong/abbr. for 維多利亞港|维多利亚港[Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gang3]
Yau Tsim Mong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
Hung Hom, a locality in Kowloon, Hong Kong
Sham Shui Po district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
